mapper.select: SELECT B.MEM_CODE AS MEM_CODE , B.NAME AS MEM_NAME , CASE WHEN B.MEM_TYPE = 2 AND B.GENDER = 'M' THEN 'Service Technician' ELSE C.CODE_NAME || CASE WHEN C.CODE_DESC = 'HP' THEN '[HP Type]' ELSE NULL END END AS MEM_TYPE_NAME , D.NAME AS MEM_STATUS , E.CODE AS BRNCH_CODE , E.NAME AS BRNCH_NAME , CASE WHEN NVL(O1.MEM_LVL, 0) = 4 THEN O3.DEPT_CODE WHEN NVL(O1.MEM_LVL, 0) = 3 THEN O2.DEPT_CODE WHEN NVL(O1.MEM_LVL, 0) = 2 THEN O1.DEPT_CODE ELSE NULL END AS GRP_CODE , CASE WHEN NVL(O1.MEM_LVL, 0) = 4 THEN O3.DEPT_CODE WHEN NVL(O1.MEM_LVL, 0) = 3 THEN O2.DEPT_CODE WHEN NVL(O1.MEM_LVL, 0) = 2 THEN O1.DEPT_CODE ELSE NULL END AS ORG_CODE , CASE WHEN NVL(O1.MEM_LVL, 0) IN (3, 4) THEN O1.DEPT_CODE ELSE NULL END AS DEPT_CODE , F.NAME AS BANK_NAME , B.BANK_ACC_NO AS BANK_ACC_NO , TO_CHAR(B2.AG_EXPR_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS AG_EXPR_DT , B.TEL_MOBILE AS MEM_HPNO , B.EMAIL AS MEM_EMAIL , UPPER(E.ADDR1 || ' ' || E.ADDR2 || ' ' || E.ADDR3 || ' ' || E.ADDR4) AS BRNCH_ADDR , TO_CHAR(B.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID) AS IMG_GRP_ID , TO_CHAR(UPPER(B.ADDR_DTL || ',' || B.STREET || ', ' || S64.POSTCODE || ' ' || S64.CITY || ', ' || S64.STATE || ', ' || S64.COUNTRY)) AS MEM_ADDRS , TO_CHAR(B.INC_TAX) AS MEM_INC_TAX , TO_CHAR(ORG03.APLICNT_MEETPOINT) AS MEM_MEETPOINT_CDE , TO_CHAR(UPPER(SYS89.MEET_POINT_CODE || '-' || SYS89.MEET_POINT_DESC)) AS MEM_MEETPOINT_DESC FROM SYS0047M A INNER JOIN ORG0001D B ON A.HR_CODE = B.MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN ORG0002D B2 ON B.MEM_ID = B2.MEM_ID INNER JOIN SYS0013M C ON C.CODE_MASTER_ID = 1 AND B.MEM_TYPE = C.CODE_ID INNER JOIN SYS0038M D ON B.STUS = D.STUS_CODE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0005M E ON B.BRNCH = E.BRNCH_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0004M F ON F.STUS_CODE_ID = 1 AND B.BANK = F.BANK_ID LEFT JOIN ORG0005D O1 ON B.MEM_ID = O1.MEM_ID LEFT JOIN ORG0005D O2 ON O2.MEM_ID = O1.MEM_UP_ID LEFT JOIN ORG0005D O3 ON O3.MEM_ID = O2.MEM_UP_ID LEFT JOIN ORG0005D O4 ON O4.MEM_ID = O3.MEM_UP_ID LEFT JOIN ORG0005D O5 ON O5.MEM_ID = O4.MEM_UP_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0064M S64 ON B.AREA_ID = S64.AREA_ID LEFT JOIN ORG0003D ORG03 ON B.APLICNT_ID = ORG03.APLCTN_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0089M SYS89 ON ORG03.APLICNT_MEETPOINT = SYS89.MEET_POINT_ID WHERE A.USER_NAME = #{userName}

SELECT A.ROLE_CODE AS USER_ROLE FROM SYS0044M A INNER JOIN SYS0045M B ON A.ROLE_ID = B.ROLE_ID INNER JOIN SYS0047M C ON B.USER_ID = C.USER_ID WHERE 1=1 AND C.USER_NAME = #{userName} AND A.ROLE_ID IN ( SELECT CODE FROM SYS0094M WHERE IND = 'ACI_ROLE')

SELECT IMG_ID FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(B.ATCH_FILE_ID) AS IMG_ID, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY A.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID ORDER BY A.UPD_DT DESC) LATEST FROM SYS0070M A JOIN SYS0071D B ON A.ATCH_FILE_ID = B.ATCH_FILE_ID WHERE A.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID = #{imgGrpId} AND B.FILE_KEY_SEQ = 6 ) WHERE LATEST = 1
